channel.title: Tools on EnzymeML Project
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on EnzymeML Project

item.title: EnzymeML Template
item.description: Tutorial and best practices The EnzymeML Team provides a template in the commonly used spreadsheet format, which was designed to facilitate the report of biocatalytic and enzymatic data using EnzymeML. The template was designed such that valid OMEX archives can be created by submitting the resulting spreadsheet to the official conversion page found here. This document will further explain the workflow and how to use the spreadsheet by giving best practices.
